Question: Shenzhen Antop Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Antop Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: TV Antennas

- Manufactures indoor and outdoor digital TV antennas
- Offers professional CATV, MATV, and SMATV signal distribution products and communication antennas
- Two factories with a total floor space of 110,000 square meters and over 1,200 employees
- Monthly output of 900,000 units with strict adherence to ISO 9001: 2008 Quality Control Systems
- Emphasizes research and development with an annual investment of over US$2,500,000
- More than 50 professional engineers constantly responding to new technological and regulatory quality
- Customization of new products according to customer demand
- Products accredited with CE, GS, RoHS, R&TTE, RED, FCC, UL, and Prop65 certificates
